title: Miner who quits right before he hits the diamonds behind the wall meme

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to mine or to quit.
- If you mine, you visit no one and have a 2% chance of finding diamonds.
- If you quit, you become a Survivor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each time you mine, there is a 2% increased chance of finding diamonds.
- If you find diamonds, you revive each night after dying and have immunity to everything except hanging. (This includes roleblocks and controls and frames and stuff.)
